titleStmt.title: The life and death of Mr. Vavasor Powell, that faithful minister and confessor of Jesus Christ wherein his eminient conversion, laborious successful ministry, excellent conversation, confession of faith, worthy sayings, choice experiences, various sufferings, and other remarkable passages in his life and at his death are faithfully recorded for publick benefit : with some elogies and epitaphs by his friends.
titleStmt.author: Bagshaw, Edward, 1629-1671.
Powell, Vavasor, 1617-1670.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: p. 143-176 lacking from both microform copies.
This item is identified as Wing B418 at reel 1323:24 and as Wing L2003 at reel 1425:23.
Wing number B418 is cancelled in Wing (CD-ROM, 1996).
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
